item.title: Markdown Syntax 2
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files.

item.title: Markdown Syntax 1
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files.

item.title: Esempio 3
item.description: The following is a code sample using the “highlight” shortcode provided in Hugo. This is server side highlighting and requires Python and Pygments to be installed. var num1, num2, sum num1 = prompt("Enter first number") num2 = prompt("Enter second number") sum = parseInt(num1) + parseInt(num2) // "+" means "add" alert("Sum = " + sum) // "+" means combine into a string
